note.p: Burial: The parish church of Grantham, Lincolnshire
Education: Lincoln College, Oxford. BA (1668). Gray's Inn (admitted 1668)

Career: Called to the Bar (1676); Serjeant-at-Law (1700); Recorder of Lincoln (1700); Baron of the Exchequer (1701), for which office he apparently gave Lord Keeper Wright a bribe of Â£1000; Chief Baron of the Exchequer (1716)
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; DNB; Foster; GI
